DataElement.preferredName: Household Survey Prior Diagnosis Child Main Daily Activities or Responsibilities Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Description of a person's "other" main daily activity or responsibility.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Household Survey Prior Diagnosis Child Main Daily Activities or Responsibilities
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._Earlier in time or order._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._A question that requests a description of an individual's main daily activities or responsibilities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.:A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.

Concepts.definition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.
A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.

Property.preferredName: Prior Diagnosis Child Main Daily Activities or Responsibilities

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.
A question that requests a description of an individual's main daily activities or responsibilities.
